灉字的基本解释

灉
yōng
古河名，约在今中国山东省西部、河北省南部一带：“（兖州）雷夏既泽，灉、沮会同。”
从中国黄河主道分出又流回主河道的水。

灉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yōng］
［《廣韻》於容切，平鍾，影。］
［《廣韻》於用切，去用，影。］
(1)古水名。即古汳（汴）水流经河南省商丘虞城的一段。又作雝水，后堙。
(2)古水名。故道约在今山东省西部、河北省南部一带。
(3)水名。发源于山东省菏泽市境，东北流过郓城，注入黄河。又名赵王河。

灉字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灉； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页662第25
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?於容切，音邕。【說文】河灉水，在宋。【爾雅·釋水】灉反入。又水自河出爲灉。【註】卽河水決出復還入者，河之有灉，猶江之有汜。【書·禹貢】灉沮會同。　又或作澭㴩，亦通作雍。　又通作維。【周禮·夏官·職方氏】兗州，其浸盧維。【註】維，於恭切。　又湖名。【范致明岳陽風土記】灉湖，在州南。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?於用切，雍去聲。義同。

灉字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
灉字的起名意思

暂无。

灉
Basic explanation of words
灉
yōng
The name of the ancient river was approximately in the western part of Shandong Province and the southern part of Hebei Province in present-day China: "(Yanzhou) Leixia Jize, together with Yan and Ju."
Water that diverges from the main channel of the Yellow River in China and flows back to the main channel.
灉
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yōng］
["Guangyun" Yu Rongqie, Pingzhong, Ying. ]
["Guangyun" is used to cut, to use, and to shadow. ]
(1) Ancient water name. That is, the section of Gubiao (Bian) water flowing through Yucheng, Shangqiu, Henan Province. It is also called Yongshui and Houhou.
(2) Ancient water names. The old road was approximately in the western part of Shandong Province and the southern part of Hebei Province.
(3) Water name. Originated in the border of Heze City, Shandong Province, it flows through Yuncheng in the northeast and flows into the Yellow River. Also known as Zhao Wanghe.
灉

[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　灉; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 662 25
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Yu Rongqie, Yin Yong. [Said Wen] He Laoshui, in the Song Dynasty. [Erya·Shui Shui] Back in. Water comes out of the river. [Note] Those who return to the river will decide whether to return to the river. 【Book·Yugong】Lan Ju Huitong.　 or 澭㴩, also known as Yong.　Through the maintenance again. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Zhi Fang Shi】Yanzhou, it was immersed in Lu Wei. [Note] Wei, Yu Gongqie.　Also the name of the lake. [Fan Zhiming Yueyang Fengtu Ji] Bahu, in southern Zhouzhou.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Use cutting, Yong Qu. The same meaning.
